p: The positive control used for Lassa assays were previously detected Lassa samples from Irrua, Edo State, Nigeria with accession number GU481078 NIG 08-A47 2008 IRRUA, while those for Dengue and YFV assays were both tissue cultured inactivated samples all from the Virology Unit Laboratory of the Bernhard Nocht Institute of Tropical Medicine, Hamburg, Germany through our collaborations.
